item.title: Version 4.8.0
item.description:
FocusMode 4.8.0

What’s New

  • Features Tab: Now you can hide and disable any feature you don’t use from the FocusMode UI completely. This helps you keep the app personalized and minimal.
  • Preferences Window: We’ve redesigned it to make navigation easier with better organized settings under appropriate tabs.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed: Quick switching tasks from quick access now properly records your session
  • Fixed: Calendar session sync no longer creates duplicate events and works correctly
  • Fixed: Workspace blocked websites now properly appear in the websites tab
  • Fixed: Calendar’s “snooze until time” feature is now working as expected
  • Fixed: Pomodoro skip feature now functions correctly
  • Fixed: Pomodoro break options now display properly in digital mode
